tweet: We are influencing a new generation of American leaders to defend life, and my hope is that this trend continues until Roe v Wade is overturned. The first right recognized by Americans of every generation is life. I will continue to advocate for #prolife policies in Congress.

New York, Virginia, and Rhode Island are trying to reverse the progress the national #prolife movement has made, but I’m thankful that under @POTUS
@realDonaldTrump's leadership, the federal government has prioritized the protection of life.

Since Roe v Wade was decided by the U.S. Supreme Court, over 60 million lives have been snuffed out. We will never know how those innocent ones might have changed the world, their communities, or their families.

As we work to end abortion, people in several states are cheering the expansion of one of the most barbaric practices America has ever witnessed. Abortion takes the life of an unborn baby – a human being with God-given potential. pic.twitter.com/B3KFTEDSRh
